title: Three Kingdoms(Sangokushi) 1992 2b
description:
I bought this DVD from Taiwan like 5 years ago and brought it back to the US. This anime was totally awesome. 

There is an english Dub version only on torrent sites called "Great Conquest: The Romance of Three Kingdoms" , so I decided to make the chinese dubbed available for all. 

IMDB:
SANGOKUSHI (1992), released in an English-dubbed version as GREAT CONQUEST: THE ROMANCE OF THREE KINGDOMS, is a Japanese animated adaptation of parts of one of the great works of Chinese literature, an account of the wars and political struggles that led to the unification of China nearly 2000 years ago
